The game is very interesting with the advent of free access, a lot of cheaters have appeared in the game, but Valve is struggling with this. Thank them for the game.
Played this game for about 1000 hours and it's still my favorite game. Basic concept, but still a lot to learn, I recommend this if you're into tactical shooter games.

if you're looking to get into tactical shooters, cs isnt a bad option, it definitely has a learning curve that isnt easy to grasp at the very beginning but over time you can get the hang of things. best to be played with a group of friends (preferably a full team of 5) overall id rate it about an 8/10
